name: When this pig fly
description:
A simple adventure game for mobile along with an H5 and exe build.
You play as Ava the pig who builds a ship to fly across her world and battle an orc invasion while collecting coins and jewels.

You use your finger and or mouse if you're using the HTML5 version or Bluestacks.
The game ends when you get hit.

This is going to be one of many android 1st games made by JatoStyle for here until I move to a Playstore.
